titles.title: Homeland Defense Operations Pay Equity Act

To provide for the nonreduction in pay from a position of employment with the Federal Government for members of the Coast Guard Reserve or the National Guard participating in homeland defense missions.
Homeland Defense Operations Pay Equity Act

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Oversight and Government Reform.

term.name: Government employee pay, benefits, personnel management

bill.summary: Homeland Defense Operations Pay Equity Act - Revises the Omnibus Appropriations Act of 2009 to extend to federal government employees who are members of the Coast Guard Reserve or National Guard an entitlement to receive the basic pay which would have been payable for their civilian employment when absent while serving on active duty or training in certain domestic operations and emergencies.
